short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create advanced job searches across multiple job boards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Job Search Helper makes finding your next opportunity easier than ever. This Chrome extension allows you to:

Quickly search job postings across major platforms like Workday, Greenhouse, LinkedIn, and more.
Customize your search by entering specific job roles or keywords (e.g., "software engineer" or "marketing manager").
Specify a location or search for remote opportunities worldwide.
Save time with a pre-defined search string tailored to job seekers.
Take control of your job hunt and streamline the process with Job Search Helper.
